explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man wearing a black jacket sits in front of a paint-splattered table. He holds a spray paint can in his right hand and a green object in his left hand. On the table, there is a transparent plastic cup, a metal ruler, and shelves full of paint cans in the background.

[0-6] First, the man in the black jacket places the green object on the table with his left hand and pours mint green paint from the spray can into the transparent plastic cup with his right hand. The scene switches, the upper half shows a blue-green car parked on the side of the road, the lower half shows the table, and then white paint, black paint, and dark green paint are added to the plastic cup.
